data.title: Initial Consultation
data.description: We'll meet to discuss your vision, style preferences, and wedding details. This helps me understand how to best tell your story.

data.title: Planning & Timeline
data.description: I'll help create a photography timeline that ensures we capture all important moments while keeping your day flowing smoothly.

data.title: Engagement Session
data.description: A pre-wedding photo session helps us get comfortable working together and provides beautiful images for your save-the-dates.

data.title: Timeline Management
data.description: I'll work seamlessly with your other vendors to keep everything on schedule while capturing both planned and spontaneous moments.

data.title: Photography Coverage
data.description: From getting ready through to the last dance, I'll document all the big moments and the intimate details that make your day unique.

data.title: Candid Moments
data.description: While capturing the formal shots, I'll also be on the lookout for those natural, unscripted moments that tell your authentic story.

data.title: Image Selection
data.description: I carefully select and edit the best images that tell the complete story of your day, ensuring each photo meets my high standards.

data.title: Gallery Delivery
data.description: Within 6-8 weeks, you'll receive your private online gallery of carefully curated and beautifully edited images.

data.title: Album Design
data.description: We'll work together to design a premium wedding album that perfectly tells the story of your special day.

data.title: Initial Consultation
data.description: We'll discuss your vision, preferred style, and any specific requirements to ensure your portraits align with your expectations.

data.title: Style Planning
data.description: I'll guide you through outfit selections, location choices, and provide tips to help you feel confident and prepared.

data.title: Session Preparation
data.description: You'll receive a detailed guide with tips for preparing for your session, including timing, what to bring, and what to expect.

data.title: Relaxed Environment
data.description: I create a comfortable, fun atmosphere where you can be yourself, ensuring natural and authentic expressions.

data.title: Professional Direction
data.description: I'll guide you through poses and expressions while capturing both planned shots and candid moments.

data.title: Image Review
data.description: We'll review shots throughout the session to ensure we're capturing your vision and make adjustments as needed.

data.title: Preview Gallery
data.description: Within 48 hours, you'll receive a curated selection of preview images to get excited about your final gallery.

data.title: Professional Editing
data.description: Each selected image is carefully edited to enhance its natural beauty while maintaining authenticity.

data.title: Final Delivery
data.description: Within 2 weeks, you'll receive your complete online gallery with all your beautifully edited images.
